title: Land with a house for Sale in Kurana, Negombo
details:
46 perches land with a house for sale in Kurana. 100 meters from Colombo-Chilow main road. 400 meters from Kurana train station.
2 A/C rooms with attached bathrooms with hot water shower.
1 Fan Room with attached bathroom with hot water shower.
6 bed rooms with shared bathroom with hot water shower.
2 store rooms.
Kitchen.
Living area.
Long veranda.
Annex ,with one bedroom attached bathroom with hot water shower. Kitchen. Living area. Out side sitting area.
